column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Wendy who was our server
column2: was friendly and had great energy even during the end of her 16 hr shift! She made good recommendations for my boyfriend and I. She recommended that I get the spicy miso Tonkatsu with level inferno spice
column3: which are both off the menu. I highly recommend as well if you like a spicy
column4: thick and hearty broth! I added tofu and Bok choy. I also got an extra order of noodles which I realized I didn't need because my bowl was super full when I first got it (lunch for tomorrow yay!)! She recommended the Tonkatsu white for my boyfriend. He added bean sprouts
